title: Go Tell It On the Mountain pacing

content.question: The pacing of the narrative is set by the fact that the events it describes are

choices.label: a sequence of unintended consequences that result from a decision John casually makes
a chaotic collection of memories that are stirred up when John sees his family in the kitchen
John’s alternating attention to his past and his present experiences
John’s internal reactions to a series of people and things in the order he encounters them

content.answer: John’s internal reactions to a series of people and things in the order he encounters them

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe how plot orders events in a narrative.
